Ella tiene 47 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene dos hijos, ella es técnica en enfermería y en sus horas libre se dedica a la elaboración de panes y pasteles. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y ve la muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Las Palmeras del Manu” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar sacos de harina para seguir elaborando panes. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Doris was born in the city of Cusco, but she lives in Salvación, which is in Manu district, Manu province, Madre de Dios department, Peru. She is 47 years old, married, and has two children. She is a nursing technician and in her free time, she makes bread and pastries. She has worked in this business for several years and it is going very well, thanks to the effort she puts into her work.

Doris belongs to the "Las Palmeras del Manu" communal bank. She is currently requesting a loan to buy sacks of flour so she can keep making bread. She values and is grateful for the loan, and she promises to make her monthly payments.

loans.use: to buy sacks of flour.

location.town: Salvacion - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: Akobir

texts.ru: Акобир спокойный и честный молодой человек. Он родился в 1985 года в сельской местности. Акобир родился в бедной семье. Его родители были простыми фермерами. Акобир не смог получить высшее образование. Он не имеет постоянное место работы в Таджикистане, поэтому он каждый год ездит в Российскую Федерацию в целях найти работу. Ему очень тяжело находится далеко от своих родителей, жены и 3 детей. Его дети маленькие, а жена нигде не работает и занимается воспитанием детей. Акобир всегда старается для благо своей семьи. Он недавно приехал на родину. Акобир хочет отремонтировать свой дом, но не имеет денег. Он запрашивает займ для покупки строительных материалов как цемент, древесина, песок и т.п. для ремонта дома. Акобир и его семья ждут вашу доброту и милосердие.
texts.en: Akobir is an honest and even-tempered young man.  He was born in 1985 to a poor family in a village.  His parents were simple farmers and Akobir couldn't get a higher education.  He doesn't have steady work in Tajikistan, which is why he goes to the Russian Federation every year to find work.  It is very difficult for him to be located so far from his parents, wife and three children.  His children are small and his wife has nowhere to work, as she takes care of the children.  Akobir always strives for the betterment of his family.  He returned home not long ago and he wants to make repairs on his house, but he doesn't have the money.  He is asking for a loan to buy building materials like cement, wood, sand, etc. to repair his home.  Akobir and his family await your kindness and charity.

loans.use: To buy building materials like soil, cement, wood to make repairs on his house

loans.name: 08-03-12-Phú Sơn 2 Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Tuyết operates a food stall/restaurant selling beverage. She is requesting a loan to purchase drinks to sell. Tuyết is 38 years old and she is married with two children. Tuyết is the group leader of the 08-03-12-Phú Sơn2 solidarity group, which consists of four members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with her two dependents

In 2012, Tuyết joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Tuyết has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Tuyết has been involved in this business for more than 10 years The main hardship that Tuyết faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Tuyết hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase drinks to resell

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en: Marissa has been selling woven nipa leaves for six years, earning enough income for a good living. Her previous loan from GDMPC was used to purchase raw materials and was successfully repaid. Marissa has borrowed a new loan to purchase more nipa leaves to weave. She also buys woven nipa from her community and sells it in town in volume. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from her loan to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more nipa leaves to weave

loans.name: Buenaventura

texts.es:
Buenaventura, es una mujer de 38 años de edad, se identifica en la comunidad, por su lucha constante y deseos de superación, tanto personales como de su familia, posee una familia pequeña conformada  por su hijo y su nuera, ambos forman parte del trabajo que periódicamente se realiza en el hogar. La señora Buenaventura posee buenos principios morales y religiosos que le marcan en su comunidad.

La señora Buenaventura se dedica a los oficios domésticos, desde una temprana edad, fue su madre quien le enseño, en la actualidad ella pretende emprender otras actividades que le generen otros ingresos y mantengan el núcleo familiar integrado. 

Necesita el financiamiento, para adquirir un molino de nixtamal, para que tanto su hijo como su nuera puedan ocuparse en una actividad productiva. Además, de generar ingresos llevar un beneficio a la comunidad.

La señora manifiesta que su propósito es luchar, esforzarse por salir bien con el compromiso para dejar  huellas, que sus hijos puedan seguir y también tengan esta alternativa en sus proyectos y necesidades a futuro.
texts.en:
Buenaventura is a 38 year old woman. She is known in the community for her constant struggle and desire to succeed both personally and with her family. 
She has a small family composed of her son and her daughter in law. They both periodically do some of the work done at home. Buenaventura has good moral and religious principles that are known in her community.

 Buenaventura has been engaged in household chores from an early age. Her mother taught her these chores. Now she intends to undertake other activities that generate other sources of income and maintain the integrated family. 

She needs a loan to purchase a corn mill.  With this purchase, her son and daughter in law can engage in a productive activity. In addition, this will generate revenue which will lead to benefiting the community. She states that her intention is to fight and to strive to succeed in order to leave a great impression. Her family can continue and they will also have this alternative for their projects and future needs.

loans.use: purchase a cornmill

loans.name: Miltón Balmore

texts.es:
Miltón de 27 años de edad, vive con su familia y se dedica a prestar sus servicios de transporte en su moto taxi que posee; ademas, trabaja en la agricultura con su padre y en la ganadería. Miltón se acompaño y tuvo una niña  que tiene la edad de 5 años no estudian, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos de la casa y cuida de la mamá del esposo.

él posee una mototaxi desde hace 4 años, en la cual el trabaja todo los días, tiene otra actividad que es la ganadería, en la venta de la leche.


El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar un torete, ya que ellos vendieron el que tenían.


Los sueño que posee,  es que su hija pueda estudiar y ofrecerle una mejor vida a su familia, también mejorara poco a poco la mototaxi para dar mejor servicio a los clientes.
texts.en:
Miltón, who is 27 years old, lives with his family. He offers transportation services with his motorcycle taxi, which he owns. In addition, he works in agriculture with his father and in livestock raising. He has a partner and a daughter who is 5 years and does not go to school. His wife does the household domestic work and cares for her husband's mother.

He has had a motorcycle taxi for 4 years, and he uses it for work every day. His other activity is livestock raising and selling milk.

The loan that he is applying for is to buy a young bull, since they sold the one they had.

His dreams are that his daughter can go to school and he can offer a better life to his family. He also wants to improve his motorcycle taxi little by little to give better service to his customers.

loans.use: to buy a young bull

loans.name: Samuel Eugenio

texts.es:
Samuel,  tiene 54 años de edad, está casado y su esposa tiene 50 años de edad, disfruta de dos hijos, uno de ellos les ayuda en el negocio y el otro estudia bachillerato. El se dedica a la crianza de pollos de engorde, el oficio lo aprendió de familia y  lleva diez años de poseerlo, lo realiza todos los días.
El préstamo que requiere le permitirá comprar pollos, vitaminas y concentrado; este le ayudara a incrementar sus inventarios y obtener más ingresos.
Su sueño es fortalecer el negocio y brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Samuel is 54 years old and married. His wife is 50 years old. They have two children: one helps them with the business and the other is in high school. 

Samuel earns a living by raising and fattening chickens, which he learned from his family. He has been doing this every day for 10 years. 

He is requesting this loan to purchase chickens, vitamins, and feed. This will help him increase his inventory and earn more income. He hopes to strengthen his business and offer a better quality of life to his family.

loans.use: to buy chickens, vitamins, and feed.

loans.name: Noor

texts.en: Noor was born in 1995. She lives at a sector in Jordan called Irbid with her five siblings and her parents. She is the oldest child. Noor has been selling clothes for one year. She started her business with a small quantity of clothes. She considered her work as a good source of income to support her family financially. Now she is planning to expand her business by buying a larger quantity of clothes to increase her profits. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she applied for this youth loan.

loans.use: To buy more clothes for her business

loans.name: Mukaramakhon

texts.ru: Мукарамахон родилась в 1967 года. Она женщина с национальным духом. Мукарамахон уважает все традиции и обычаи таджикского народа. Она замужем и имеет 2 дочерей. Она более 30 лет занимается изготовлением лепешек. Она начала свой бизнес с 2 мешка муки. Постепенно она развевала свой бизнес. Мукарамахон является единственной пекарем лепешек в своем районе. Ее муж помогает ей введению бизнеса. Он продает лепешки. Мукарамахон с полученного дохода выдала замуж свою дочь и отремонтировала свой дом. Она хочет пополнить оборотный капитал и с такой целью она обратилась за займом. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 10000 сомони для покупки муки. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Mukaramakhon was born in 1967. She is a woman filled with national spirit. Mukaramakhon respects all the traditions and customs of the Tajik people. She is married and has two daughters. She has been making flatbread for more tha thirty years. She started her business with two sacks of flour. Gradually she increased her business. Mukaramakhon is the only flatbread baker in her area. Her husband helps her run the business. He sells the flat bread. Mukaramakhon would like to take profits she earns from the loan to marry off her daughter and renovate her house. She wants to replenish her working capital and so she applied for a loan. She is requesting a loan of 10,000 TJS to buy flour. She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: buy flour

loans.name: Karomat

texts.ru: Каромат развивает день изо дня свои навыки и умения. Она портниха. Каромат умеет шить красиво и аккуратно национальные платья. Каромат считает, что для одного человека необходимы несколько профессий. Она всегда мечтала стать учительницей. Она для того, чтобы осуществить свою мечту поступила в Педагогический институт. Она учится отлично и параллельно занимается своим бизнесом. Она мечтает после окончания института работать в школе и преподавать младшим классам. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 сомони для оплаты учебного договора. Она не замужем и живет с родителями, а ее родители не в состоянии поддержать ее. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Every day Karomat improves her skills. She is a dressmaker. Karomat sews traditional dresses beautifully and precisely. Karomat believes people need to have more than one vocation. She has always dreamed of becoming a teacher. In order to realize her dream, she entered the Pedagogical Institute. She is a good student and runs her business while she studies. After graduation, she dreams of working in a school and teaching the younger grades. She is asking for a loan of 1,000 KGS to pay tuition. She is not married and lives with her parents, and her parents are not able to help her financially. She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: pay tuition

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud is a 21-year-old single young man from Qalqilia who lives with his family in a very simple house. Mahmoud's father is a worker who gets a very low and unstable income. Last year, Mahmoud decided to help his family by opening a small farm to raise. It is a good business and he has the experience to manage it. Mahmoud would like to improve his farm.
 
Mahmoud requested a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more sheep to raise for his farm. By taking this loan, Mahmoud will be able to increase the number of sheep and his income. 

Mahmoud appears in the photo on his farm

loans.use: to buy more sheep to raise

loans.name: 08-03-11-Phú Sơn2 Group

texts.en:
Thảo is 31 years old and she is married with two children. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with two dependents.

Thảo operates a food stall/restaurant selling snacks. She is requesting a loan to purchase rice and pork to make cakes to sell. She has been involved in this business for five years. The main hardship that Thảo faces in her business is the lack of capital.

In 2012, Thảo joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. She has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Thảo is the group leader of the 08-03-11-Phú Sơn2 solidarity group, which consists of five members.

With her business profit, she hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase rice and pork to make cakes to sell

loans.name: Monday

texts.en:
Monday is 30 years old and lives in the town of Kinoni in the region of Masaka in Uganda. He is married and has three children with two of them currently in school. For the past two years, Monday has been working hard to manage his boutique where he sells various clothes. 

To help expand his business, Monday has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more clothes for the business and will help Monday to generate greater profits and take care of his children's medical bills. Monday hopes that in the future, he will be able to achieve his goals. 

Monday is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Monday who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.


"

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell

loans.name: Joel

texts.en:
Joel is 32 years old and lives in Villa M. Tejero, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte. He is married with five children.
Joel works in the fishing industry, catching and selling fish for a living. He has been doing this for 24 years. He has requested a loan to purchase a fishing net.
Joel is a new member of PMPC, joining in 2013. In the future, Joel hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to purchase a fishing net

location.town: Liloy-Villa M Tejero, Liloy Zamboanga Del Norte

loans.name: 3.19.604.8. Thị Trấn Quán Lào Group

texts.en:
Huệ operates a food stall/restaurant selling beverages. She is requesting a loan to purchase materials to maintain a refreshment bar selling coffee, tea, soft drinks, fast food, etc.

Huệ is 22 years old and is married with two children..
Huệ is the group leader of the 3.19.604.8. thị trấn Quán Lào solidarity group, which consists of three members. 
She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province

This is Huệ first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.
Huệ has been involved in this business for five years.
One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Huệ hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, for her business to do well, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase materials to maintain a refreshment bar selling coffee, tea, soft drinks, fast food, etc.

loans.name: Joel

texts.en: Joel is from Bayabas, Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. He is married with three children.  He was cultivating corn on his farm and earning enough that he was able to provide for his living. In 2011, Joel joined GDMPC. His previous loan that he used to purchase fertilizers was successfully repaid. He earned such good returns from his farm that he expanded by cultivating another corn field. Recently, he requested a new loan to purchase a new variety of seeds and fertilizer. Joel wants to improve the general living situation of his family.

loans.use: to purchase a new variety of seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Edy Sabino

texts.es:
Edy de 26 años de edad, sus estudios los realizo hasta 9° grado, el motivo por el cual, no pudo seguir estudiando; es por  falta de recurso económico, ya que sus padres eran muy pobres y no tenían lo suficiente para darle los estudios en ese tiempo. Desde entonce el comenzó a trabajar en talleres, en salineras y con su padre en la agricultura, creció y se  caso y hoy en día tiene dos hijos un barón de 5 años y una niña recién nacida.

Edy es una persona muy conocida en la zona donde vive y es trabajador él es albañil y  repara bombas para poso, él es bien versátil en reparar motores.  Esto lo aprendió desde la edad de 18 años de edad. Se traslada a una distancia de 8 km para brindarle el servicio de  repara las bombas. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar una moto para transportarse y de esa manera poder dar un buen servicio a los clientes. Le mejorara, porque así no tendrá dificultad para los ingresos de dinero para su familia. 
   

Sus sueños es, que crezcan los hijos sin que le falten nada y en el futuro poder seguir trabajando con la fundación campo.
texts.en:
Edy, 26, went to school through ninth grade. He couldn't continue school due to a lack of economic resources because his parents were very poor and didn't have enough money at the time. Since then, he has been working in workshops, salt mines, and farming with his father. He grew up, got married, and now has two children: a boy, 5, and a girl who was recently born.

Edy is well know in the area where he lives. He is hard-working and works in construction and in repairing pump wells. He is also skilled in repairing motors, which he learned when he was 18. He travels 8 km to provide pump repair services.

Edy is requesting this loan to buy a motorcycle for transportation, which will allow him to provide good service to his customers. This will bring improvements and he will not have trouble providing his family with money.

His dream is for his children to grow up and have everything they need, and in the future, keep working with the land established.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for transportation.

loans.name: Deysi Yamileth

texts.es: Deysi, tiene 36 años de edad, esta casada y tiene dos hijos, reside en el municipio de Omoa, Cortes.  Ella estableció su propio negocio para la manutención familiar y lleva 13 años vendiendo productos de la canasta básica familiar en su pulpería, vende granos básicos, azúcar, manteca, pastas, productos de limpieza y productos enlatados, huevos, harina, pan, café, condimentos, refrescos, churros y otros. Ha obtenido varios prestamos para mantener estable este negocio. actualmente solicita otro por 18,000 Lempiras para surtir de mas productos alimenticios para vender, como frijoles, arroz, azúcar, manteca, huevos, café, pan, churros, refrescos, y otros, con el fin de seguir manteniendo el negocio para mejorar su condición de vida.
texts.en: Deysi is 36 years old. She is married and has two children. She lives in the town of Omoa, Cortes. She established her own business to support her family, and for 13 years she has been selling basic family products in her grocery store. She sells basic grains, sugar, lard, pastas, cleaning products, canned goods, eggs, flour, bread, coffee, condiments, soft drinks, chips, and other items. She has obtained a number of loans to keep this business stable. Now she is applying for another one of 18,000 Lempiras to stock more food products to sell, such as beans, rice, sugar, lard, eggs, coffee, bread, chips, soft drinks, and other items, with the goal of continuing to maintain her business to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to stock her business with products such as beans, rice, sugar, lard, eggs, coffee, bread, chips, soft drinks, and other items

loans.name: Bumaira

texts.ru: Бумайре 49 лет, замужем, мать -героиня, вместе с супругом воспитывают 6 детей. Семья у Бумайры дружная, супруг во всем поддерживает Бумайру. Все члены семьи вовлечены в бизнес и помогают своей маме по хозяйству. У Бумайры - среднее образование, она очень ответственная женщина. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Бумайра занимается животноводством, стартовав 22 года  назад, с покупки скота на 5,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду и настойчивому характеру Бумайры, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 дойные коровы, 1 лошадь. Ежемесячный доход составляет 4,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, а также с целью дать достойное будущее своим детям, Бумайра обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Бумайра планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку холодильника.
texts.en: Bumaira is 49 years old, married and a hero-mother who has six children with her husband.  Her family is close and her husband supports her in all her endeavors.  All the members of her family are involved in their business and they help their mother around the farm.  Bumaira has a high school education and she is a very responsible woman.  As the main source of income for her family, she raises livestock, a business that she started 22 years ago with the purchase of livestock for 5,000 som KGS.  Thanks to her hard work and perserverance, Bumaira now has three dairy cows and one horse on her farm.  The monthly income on her farm is 4,000 som (KGS).  With the goal of developing her business further, and also with the goal of giving her children a better future, Bumaira has turned to the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy sheep to increase her head of livestock.  She plans to use the income from this loan to further increase the size of her herd and she also plans to save up money to buy a refrigerator.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Obaida

texts.en: Obaida is 18 years old. He lives at a sector in Jordan called Irbid with his four brothers and his parents. His father currently works in the retirement department for the military. Obaida is in his first year studying for a bachelor's degree in finance. He is planning to continue his studies and to find a job in his study field after graduation, earning a good income to help his family financially. But he doesn't currently have enough money to pay for his upcoming semester fees. For this reason, he applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Rani

texts.en:
Rani is 42 years old and widowed, living with her four children at her brother-in-law’s home in Lahore, Pakistan.  
She owns a small canteen in a school where she offers chips, spicy food items, stationery, etc. for the students. She wants to offer burgers and sandwiches as well but she does not have the funds to buy the raw materials.
Rani requested a loan from BRAC Pakistan, which is the field partner of Kiva. She will use the loan to buy spicy ingredients, burgers, eggs and bread for making burgers and sandwiches. She belongs to a poor family; her brother-in-law does not fully financially support her because he is responsible for his own family. 
Rani seems very glad and gives thanks to Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan

loans.use: To buy food items such as burgers, eggs and bread for the canteen.

loans.name: Ziad

texts.en: Ziad is 20 years old. He lives in a sector in Jordan called Mafarq with his 12 siblings and his parents. Ziad is in his third year of studying Children Teaching.  He is planning to continue his studies and find a job in his study field after graduation to start earning a better income to help his family financially. But he doesn't currently have enough money to pay for his upcoming semester fees. For this reason, he applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: M. Aslam

texts.en:
M. Aslam is a 64-year-old married man. He lives in the rural area of Lahore, Pakistan with his wife and six children. He has been in the business of selling milk since childhood. He learned all the techniques for getting milk from his family. This is the only source of income for the family. One of his buffaloes has grown old and is producing very little milk. He delivers milk in the market and door-to-door. For delivery purposes, he uses his bicycle. He loads milk cans on his bicycle and delivers it early in the morning. His customers like the fresh and delicious milk he delivers. His monthly net income is too low due to the old buffalo not meeting the household needs.

Therefore, M. Aslam planned to purchase one more buffalo to increase his sales. However, he finds it difficult due to financial constraints. M. Aslam has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan. This will not only help him to increase sales, but it will also increase his net income and savings as well. He hopes to provide a quality education for his children. He is a very hard-working and responsible person. He is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a buffalo for milk.

loans.name: Ivania Azucena

texts.es: Ivania Azucena, mayor de edad casada con cinco hijos, originaria de uno de los  municipios de Chinandega, zona donde predomina el comercio, turismo, y las deliciosas rosquillas, Ivania es una microempresaria que se destaca de forma ambulante en el negocio de las compra y ventas de mercadería en general como: Variedades estilos de ropa tanto para niños como adultos, zapatos, prendas, cosméticos entre otros, sus productos los vende de forma contado y al crédito a clientes fijos y eventuales, los cuales recupera semanal y quincenal, negocio el cual ya son varios años de tenerlo y que le ha permitido salir adelante a ella y a sus hijos, se caracteriza por ser una mujer muy emprendedora con deseos de superación personal, el objetivo de este crédito es para invertir en capital de trabajo como están próximas las navidades sus pedidos han incrementado mas de lo previsto, por lo tanto necesita para comprar ropa, zapatos, cosméticos entre otros, Ivania agradece mucho la ayuda que los inversionistas kivas les ofrece a personas de bajos recursos económicos.
texts.en: Ivania Azucena is an older adult. She is married and has five children. She is a native of one of the towns of Chinandega, an area dominated by commerce, tourism, and the delicious doughnuts. Ivania is a micro-entrepreneur who works as a street vendor in the business of buying and selling merchandise in general, such as various styles of clothing, for children as well as for adults, shoes, accessories, and cosmetics, among other items. She sells her products to her regular and occasional customers for cash and on credit. She collects weekly and biweekly. She has already had this business for a number of years, and it has allowed her and her children to advance. She is characterized as being a very entrepreneurial woman with the desire for personal achievement. The purpose of this loan is to invest in working capital, since the Christmas season is near and her orders have increased more than expected. Therefore she needs to buy clothing, shoes, and cosmetics, among other items. Ivania is very grateful for the help that the Kiva lenders offer to people of low economic resources.

loans.use: to buy merchandise in general

loans.name: Betty

texts.en: Betty is 43 years old and lives in Candura, San Juan, Siquijor. In order to help the family, she sells canned goods, noodles, beverages and soft drinks at her sari-sari store in addition to selling rice cakes.  This year, she became an active member of Paglaum MPC with a good credit standing. She wants to obtain financial assistance of PHP 7,000 to purchase additional canned goods, noodles, beverages and soft drinks.. She plans to send her children to college so that they can help her in the future.

loans.use: To purchase additional canned goods, noodles, beverages and soft drinks.

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie is 38 years old, married and lives at Tulapos, Enrique Villanueva, Siquijor, Philippines. In order to earn a living, she takes in and raises pigs. 
Through Pauglam MPC she obtained the capital to purchase her piglets and feed. Now, she requests a loan of 7,000.00 PHP to purchase additional feed and piglets. She really hopes and prays that her business would grow and benefit her family and supplement the income of her husband. Someday, she wants to build a concrete pig cage to maintain more sanitary conditions.

loans.use: To purchase additional feed and piglets.

loans.name: 08-01-10-Phú Sơn2 Group

texts.en:
Hiền has a retail business selling electronics. She is requesting a loan to purchase electronics to resell.

Hiền is 29 years old and she is married with one child.
Hiền is the group leader of the 08-01-10-Phú Sơn2 solidarity group, which consists of three members. 
She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2012, Hiền joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Hiền has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.
Hiền has been involved in this business for 3three years.
The main hardship that Hiền faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Hiền hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase electronics to resell.

loans.name: Martina

texts.en: Martina manages her piggery to supplement her husband's income from farming. She joined GDMPC in 2011. Martina is educated and it helped improve her living situation and ability to engage in business. Her previous loan was used to invest in her business and was successfully repaid. Recently, she borrowed a new loan to purchase feed for her pigs. She hopes to gain more returns from her effort and from the capital invested in her piggery. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed for her pigs

location.town: La Victoria, Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Benita Engracia

texts.es: Doña Benita es originaria de la ciudad de San Marcos,  viuda y madre de cuatro hijos  ya independientes. Tiene 58 años de edad. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica al negocio de pulpería. Inicio este negocio hace varios años, vendiendo frijoles cocidos y con las ganancias obtenida poco a poco iba comprando golosinas para vender y otros productos. Hoy en día ha logrado mantener su negocio en pie, gracias a sus esfuerzos ofrece una variedad de productos en su pulpería.  Su meta próxima es convertir su pulpería en una miscelánea donde pueda ofrecer toda clase de productos. Solicita el crédito para comprar granos básicos como: arroz, aceite, frijoles entre otros, con el fin de aumentar su negocio. Estima que el crédito le ayudara a cumplir con la demanda de los clientes e incrementar sus ganancias. Su plan futuro es seguir creciendo en la diversidad de sus productos.
texts.en:
Benita, 58, is originally from San Marcos. She is a widow and the mother of four children who are all adults. She works as a vendor selling groceries. She started this business several years ago, selling cooked beans. With the money she made, she slowly began buying soft drinks and other products to sell. Now, she is able to maintain her business thanks to these efforts. She offers a variety of products at her store. Her goal is to turn this grocery store into a general store where she can sell all kinds of products.

She is requesting this loan to buy basic grains such as rice, cooking oil, beans, and more in order to grow her business. She thinks this loan will help her meet her customers' demands and increase her income. Her future plans is to keep growing her product diversity.

loans.use: to buy rice, cooking oil, beans, and other products.

loans.name: Gulira

texts.ru: Гулире 34 года, замужем, несмотря на свой возраст у Гулиры уже 4 детей, которых она воспитывает вместе с супругом. У Гулиры - среднее образование, сразу же после окончания школы она вышла замуж за Казыбека и с этого момента, а точнее с 1998 года в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Гулира и ее супруг стали заниматься разведением скота и земледелием, с покупки скота на 1,500 сом KGS. На сегодняшний день Гулира имеет большой опыт в этой сфере. Благодаря упорному труду Гулиры, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 дойные коровы, 40 овец, а также имеет 0,80 ГА земельной доли, на которой ежегодно выращивает фасоль с последующей реализацией. Ежемесячный доход составляет 6,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Гулира обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров в целях получения дополнительной прибыли от реализации молока. Доходы от кредита Гулира планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на ремонт дома в котором она проживает вместе со своей семьей.
texts.en: Gulira is 34 years old, married, and despite her age she is already raising four children with her husband. Gulira has a secondary education. Immediately after graduation, she married Kazybek and from that moment (that is, since 1998) Gulira and her husband's primary source of income has been cattle breeding and agriculture. They started with 1,500 KGS worth of cows. Today Gulira has extensive experience in this work. Through Gulira's hard work, her farm now boasts three dairy cows, forty sheep, and a 0.80 hectare share of land where she grew beans last season. Her monthly income is 6,000 KGS. In order to further develop her farm, Gulira approached the microfinance bank Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan of 60,000 KGS to buy cows in order to generate additional income from milk sales. Gulira plans to invest profits she makes from the loan into further expanding her herds, and plans to save enough money to repair the house where she lives with her family.

loans.use: buy cows

loans.name: Maysoon

texts.en: Maysoon was born in 1973. She is a divorced woman who lives in a rented house in a sector in Jordan called Marka. She has a daughter who is a housewife. Maysoon has been working at her own sewing workshop at her house for one year. She started her project when she learned sewing after being employed previously in sewing workshops. Then she bought her own sewing machines and started her own project at her house. Now she wants to buy more sewing machines to be more productive in order to make better profit so that she can support her and her daughter since they are living alone. But she doesn’t have enough money to do so. For this reason, she applied for this loan.

loans.use: To buy more sewing machines for her workshop

loans.name: Nora

texts.en:
Nora is a 37-year-old married woman with six children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. She sells cocoa and fish and does farming. Despite her hard work, she is challenged by seasonal changes and thieves who steal her cocoa. Her dream is to educate her children in higher institutions of learning and expand her business to suit the increasing population in Bundibugyo.

Nora will use the loan to buy more cocoa, fish and beans to sell.

loans.use: to buy more cocoa, fish and beans to sell.

loans.name: Al-Jaki Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Jaki which consists of four ladies who live in Sana`a, Yemen. They are hard-working and responsible women. They took a loan of 140,000 YER.
Salama is 38 years old, married and has three children who live together in a poor area of Sana`a, Yemen. Her husband works hard as a soldier but earns a low salary which is not enough to cover household expenses. Salama has an old house and intends to refurbish her house but the saved amount of her husband`s income will not cover the cost of construction supplies. So, she applied for a loan from AMB to buy building materials like sand, wood and cement to use to refurbish her house. With this loan, she hopes to live comfortably with her family.

loans.use: to buy building materials like sand, wood and cement to use to refurbish her house.

loans.name: Amneh

texts.en: Amneh is 23 years old. She lives at a sector in Jordan called Mafraq with her six siblings and her parents. Amneh is in her fourth year studying for a bachelor's degree in children's education. She is planning to continue her studies to find a good job in her study field after graduation and start helping her parents financially. They are currently facing a financial crisis and are unable to pay her upcoming semester fees. She also wants to buy some stationery supplies that are needed for her studies. For this reason, she applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Dionicio

texts.es: Dionicio nació en la ciudad de Cusco pero vive en la ciudad de Salvación. (La ciudad de Salvación está ubicada en el distrito del Manu en la provincia de Manu dentro del departamento de Madre de Dios, Perú), él tiene 55 años de edad y es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia y su actividad económica principal es la elaboración  de muebles de madera como sillas, mesas, carpetas, roperos y otras cosas más. Ya son varios años que se dedica a la agricultura y ve la muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo, él pertenece al banco comunal “Las Palmeras del Manu” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como madera, pinturas y clavos. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Dionicio was born in the city of Cusco but he lives in the city of Salvación. (The city of Salvación is located in Manu district, Manu province, Madre de Dios department, Perú). He is 55 years old and is a hardworking and enterprising person who pushes his family forward. His main economic activity is the manufacture of wooden furniture like chairs, tables, desks, closets and even more things.

For several years he has worked in agriculture and it is going very well for him thanks to the effort that he puts forth in his work.

He belongs to the "Las Palmeras del Manu" village bank. On this occasion, he needs the loan to buy work materials like wood, paint and nails. He is thankful for and values the loan and he is committed to meeting his monthly payments.

loans.use: to buy work materials like wood, paint and nails.

location.town: Salvacion - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: 3.19.605.9. Thị Trấn Quán Lào Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Liên has a retail business selling cosmetics. She is requesting a loan to purchase materials to create a family heirloom medicine (a Vietnamese traditional medicine, the formula of which is a family heirloom). Liên is 44 years old and she is married with two children. Liên is the group leader of the 3.19.605.9. Thị Trấn Quán Lào solidarity group, which consists of five members. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province, with her two dependents

This is Liên's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. Liên has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Liên hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, for her business to do well, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase materials to make a family heirloom medicine

loans.name: 3.19.606.7. Thị Trấn Quán Lào Group

texts.en:
Ngọc operates a food stall/restaurant selling beverages. She is requesting a loan to purchase materials to maintain the refreshment bar such as coffee, tea, soft drinks and fast food.

Ngọc is 27 years old and is married with two children.
Ngọc is the group leader of the 3.19.606.7. thị trấn Quán Lào solidarity group, which consists of  five members. 
She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Ngọc's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.
Ngọc has been involved in this business for five years.
One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Ngọc hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, for her business to do well, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase materials to maintain a refreshment bar such as coffee, tea, soft drinks and fast food.

loans.name: 06.12.1 Đông Vệ Group

texts.en:
Nga has a manufacturing business making rice vermicelli noodles. She is requesting a loan to purchase rice to make rice vermicelli noodles to resell 

Nga is 44 years old and is married with three children, one dependent and two grown up.
Nga is the group leader of the 06.12.1 Đông Vệ solidarity group, which consists of four members. 
She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2012, Nga joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Nga has successfully repaid four loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.
Nga has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.
The main hardship that Nga faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Nga hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to find a good job, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase rice to make rice vermicelli noodles to resell .

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en: Virginia  lives in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur. To earn a living, she is running a general store selling grocery goods in the local community. After 10 years in this business, Virginia earns enough to be able to provide for the needs of her children. She joined GDMPC in the year 2010, and her previous loan used in her business was successfully repaid. She requests a new loan to boost her store. She will use her loan to purchase more grocery goods for sale. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery goods for sale

loans.name: Amena

texts.en:
Amena is a 25-year-old from Gaza. She is a married woman with four children, two of whom attend a public primary school.

In 2009 she decided to do something to contribute to the family income, as her husband’s income alone is not sufficient to fulfill the demands of his family members. Since then, she has sewn clothes. Her goods are customized according to her client.

Her dream is to open a business with large number of employees working in her business who will have the opportunity to work and get income. 

Amena asking Ryada for this youth loan to buy a laundry steamer and electronic generator. She is very grateful to everyone who helps her to achieve success.

loans.use: to buy laundry steamer and electronic generator.

loans.name: Imee Joy

texts.en:
Imee Joy is from Bita-ug, Enrique Villanueva, Siquijor. She is 23 years old and single with 2 children who are infants.

This year, Imee Joy applied for membership with PMPC. Hearing all the benefits, she never hesitated to join. She maintains the status of being a member in good standing and repays her obligations in a timely manner.

Recently, Imee Joy is asking a financial assistance of 14,000 PHP to purchase bags, lotions, Tupperware and accessories. Through this, she hopes to increase her income and be of help in the expansion of her business. She has found assistance for her financial needs through Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative and she is very thankful with all her heart.

loans.use: to purchase bags, lotions, Tupperware and accessories.

loans.name: Jose Adan

texts.es:
José, está necesitando capital para invertir en la compra de maíz, leña, arroz, aceite, golosinas, azúcar, bebidas entre otros productos para tener la materia prima para elaborar tortillas para vender y surtir la tienda. 
La inversión anterior le ayudo a que su negocio fuera más competitivo, atendió mejor a sus clientes, genero ingresos con los que ha cancelado las cuotas de su crédito, ha mejorado la alimentación y salud de todos.
texts.en:
José needs capital to invest in buying corn, firewood, rice, cooking oil, soft drinks, sugar, other beverages, and more items for making tortillas to sell and stock up his store.

The last investment helped him to make his business to be more competitive, attend to more customers, generate income, pay off debt, and improve everyone's health and nutrition.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood, rice, cooking oil, soft drinks, sugar, and other beverages.

loans.name: Enemesia

texts.en:
Enemesia is 51 years old and married with three children.

She earns a living by raising livestock in the Philippines. Enemesia is borrowing 20000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional livestock and other supplies for her business.

Enemesia has been raising livestock for 4 years, and she earns additional income from buying and selling bananas.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock and other supplies for her business.

loans.name: Sandra Yamileth

texts.es:
Sandra, sabe que dentro de poco la época donde las ventas aumentan llegará, por lo que quiere tener un inventario muy surtido y se decidió por un nuevo crédito con el que comprara sodas, jugos, manzanas, uvas, peras, etc., 
Con la inversión anterior surtió el negocio, aumento sus ganancias, salió de sus deudas, las mejoras en su economía le ha permitido dar a su familia un cambio en la alimentación, su familia tiene el mismo número de miembros y se encuentran muy saludables.
texts.en:
Sandra knows that the time of year when sales increase will soon be here, and so she wishes to have a wide selection of goods for sale. She decided to request a new loan, which she will use to buy sodas, juices, apples, grapes, pears, etc.

By investing her previous loan, she was able to stock her business, improve her earnings, and repay her debts. These improvements in her finances have enabled her to give her family a better diet. The family continues with the same number of members as before, and all are in very good health.

loans.use: to buy sodas, juices, apples, grapes, pears, etc.

loans.name: Ameen

texts.en: Ameen is 21 years old. He lives at a sector in Jordan called Mafraq with his seven siblings and his parents. Ameen is in his first year studying for a bachelor's degree in English literature. He is planning to continue his studies to find a job in his study field after graduation to start earning a better income to help his family financially. But he doesn't currently have enough money to pay for his upcoming semester fees. For this reason, he applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Basma

texts.en: Basma was born in 1991. She is engaged and currently lives with her two siblings and her parents. Basma trained to make crafts, baskets, frames and trays from ash. Then she started her own project making them. She has been running this project for one year and found it to be profitable. Now, she wants to expand it by buying a larger quantity of the needed tools like ash and other raw materials to be more productive and to make a larger quantity of items. This will help her earn a better income, which will provide good financial support for her family. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she applied for this youth loan.

loans.use: To buy more ash and raw materials to make more crafts

loans.name: Lutfy

texts.ru: Лутфи родилась в 1961 года. Она замужем. Ее муж Абдусаттор добрый человек, который имеет хорошую репутацию среди местного населения. Лутфи имеет 3 детей. Ее дети совершеннолетние. Лутфи уже более 17 лет занимается купле продажей женской одежды. Летом она продает летние платья, а зимой она продает костюмы и теплые кофты. Она торгует на местном рынке. Лутфи имеет своих постоянных клиентов. Она должна обновить товар на новый сезон, но не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ для покупки женской одежды для пополнения оборотного капитала. Лутфи является повторной клиенткой ИМОН и имеет хорошее кредитное досье. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Lutfy was born in 1961. She is married. Her husband, Abdusattor, is a kind person who has a good reputation among the local population. Lutfy has three adult children. For more than 17 years, Lutfy has traded in women's clothing. During the summer she sells summer dresses, and in the winter she sells suits and warm sweaters. She trades at the local market. Lutfy has loyal customers. She needs to update her inventory for the new season, but has no money. She is asking for a loan to buy women's clothing. Lutfy is a repeat client of IMON and has a good credit history.  She is awaiting your kindness and hopes for your mercy.

loans.use: buy clothes for resale

loans.name: Ricardo Antonio

texts.es:
Ricardo, se encuentra sin capital disponible para invertir en su panadería, comprara harina, azúcar, levadura, manteca y todo lo necesario para seguir trabajando. Con el crédito anterior compro lo necesario para que su negocio funcionara y le diera una producción abundante, mejores ingresos y cancelar sus deudas.
Está trabajando duro para que su negocio siga produciendo cada día más, tener a sus clientes satisfechos, y mejorar las condiciones familiares.
texts.en:
Ricardo finds himself without capital to invest in his bakery. He will buy flour, sugar, yeast, shortening and everything else necessary to continue working. With the previous loan he bought everything necessary so that his business would work and would give him abundant production, better income, and so that he could pay off his debts.

He is working hard so that his business continues producing more every day, to have satisfied customers and to improve family conditions.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, yeast and shortening.

loans.name: 06.07.04 Đông Vệ Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Xuân has a manufacturing business making wine. She is requesting a loan to purchase rice to make rice wine to resell. Xuân is 51 years old and married with two children. Xuân is the group leader of the 06.07.04 Đông Vệ solidarity group, which consists of six members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with no dependents since her children are grown up.

This is Xuân's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. Xuân has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Xuân faces in her business is the lack of capital. With her business profit, Xuân hopes for her children to find a good job, for her business to do well, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase rice to make rice wine to resell

loans.name: 07.03.05 Phú Sơn1 Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Nụ has a retail business selling dry food. She is requesting a loan to purchase dry food to resell.

Nụ is 30 years old and married with two children. Nụ is the group leader of the 07.03.05 Phú Sơn1 solidarity group, which consists of three members. 
Nụ lives with two dependents in Thanh Hoa city, a urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2012, Nụ joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Nụ has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Nụ has been involved in this business for five years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Nụ hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase dry food to resell

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Judith is 46 years old and has one child who is still in school.

Judith has a fishing/fish vending business in the Philippines. Judith requested a PHP 7000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase fishing net and other gear for her business.

Judith has been in this business for 20 years. Judith would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase fishing net and other gear for her business.

loans.name: Karent Emilcen

texts.es:
Karent  es una mujer de 32, vive con su familia, se dedica a los quehaceres de su casa y ademas posee una tienda que la administra. Karent se caso y tuvo dos niños de 8 años el barón y la niña tiene 6 años de edad los dos estudian, su esposo ya no esta con ellos, tuvo que emigrar a los estados unidos para poder mantener bien a su familia.

Ella hoy vive con los padres, su papá se dedica a la ganadería y su madre a los quehaceres de la casa; ella realizo los estudio hasta segunda año de la universidad, cuando se caso dejo de estudiar. 

Ella a tenido la tienda desde hace 6 años,  tiene otra actividad que es la venta de la leche que saca su padre del ganado que posee.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar producto para surtir la tienda y para terminar de pagar la primera deuda que adquirió con la fundación campo.  

Los sueño que la señora tiene es que sus hijos puedan terminar sus estudios y que puedan culminar una carrera universitaria, también mejorara poco a poco la tienda para  mayor ingreso para su familia.
texts.en:
Karent is a 32 year-old woman, she lives with her family and makes her living doing the chores of her house and additionally owns a store that she runs. Karent got married and had two children: the son is 8 and the daughter is 6, both study. Her husband is no longer with them; he had to emigrate to the United States to be able to maintain his family well.

Today she lives with her parents. Her father works in cattle raising and her mother does the chores of the house. Karent studied up until the second year of university. When she married she stopped studying.

She has had the store for 6 years. She has another business, which is the sale of the milk that her father gets from the cattle he owns.

The loan that she is applying for is to buy products to stock the store and to finish paying the first loan that she acquired from Fundación Campo.

loans.use: to buy products to stock the store and to finish paying off the first loan that she acquired from Fundación Campo.

loans.name: Alice E

texts.en: Alice has helped her husband on their farm planting and harvesting rice for a living. She has been borrowing and using loans from GDMPC micro credit for the farm. Alice is thankful that she earned good returns from her farm and that she has successfully repaid her previous loans. Currently, she requests a  loan to purchase a new variety of seeds and fertilizer to improve the rice fields. She wants to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a new variety of seeds and fertilizer.

location.town: Lower Tiparak, Tambulig, Zamboanga Del Sur

loans.name: Maria Lidia

texts.es:
María, es una señora de 59 años de edad, es soltera, tiene dos hijos, ya son mayores, vive junto a uno de sus hijos, aprendió de su mamá a administrar granjas, hoy ella lo hace de forma independiente, todos los días trabaja.  Los pollos los engorda, luego los aliña para venderlos por piezas.
Invertirá en la comprará pollos, concentrado y vitaminas, esto le dará la oportunidad de tener una granja equipada para enfrentar las demandas de pollo para las graduaciones escolares y fiestas de fin de año. Aumentará su  producción, sus ganancias serán mayores, y cancelara sus deudas.
Anhela tener un negocio más rentable, mejorar su economía y darle una mejor alimentación a su familia.
texts.en:
María, is a 59 year old woman. She is single and has two children, who are grown. She lives with one of them. She learned from her how mother to farm. Today she does this independently, working every day. She fattens chickens and later seasons them to sell them in pieces.

Maria will use the loan to buy chickens concentrated feed and vitamins. This will allow her to have a farm well equipped to meet the demand for chicken for school graduations and end of the year festivals. She will increase her production, her revenues will be greater and she will pay off her debt.

Maria dreams of having a more profitable business, improving her finances and be able to feed her family better.

loans.use: to buy chickens, concentrated feed and vitamins.

loans.name: Juan Pablo

texts.es:
Juan, solicita un crédito para pagar la recolección de la cosecha y también la maquinaria para desgranar el maíz, con el crédito anterior tuvo producción, aumentó sus ingresos, cumplió con los pedidos de sus clientes y cancelo sus deudas.
El mejoro su economía, les da una mejor alimentación a su familia, todos están saludables y le brindan apoyo para realizar sus actividades.
texts.en: Juan is requesting a loan to pay to harvest his crops and also to pay for the threshing of his corn. With his last loan he increased his production and his revenues, fulfilled the demand of his clients and paid off his debt. He improved his financial situation and can feed his family better. All of his family are well and they support him in carrying out his activities.

loans.use: to pay to harvest his crops and pay for machinery to thresh his corn.

loans.name: Wasayef

texts.en: Because Wasayef is a conservative woman, she asked her son to take her place in the picture. Wasayef was born in 1962. She is a widowed woman who lives in  a sector in Jordan called Salt with her four children. Her husband was a driver. One of Wasayef's sons is studying for a Bachelor of Regional Planning. He is in his second year and he also works at the same time. Her son is planning to find a better job after graduation in order to start supporting his family financially after their father’s death. But Wasayef doesn't have enough money to pay for his upcoming semester fees. For this reason, she applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay for her son's upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Suzan

texts.en: Because Suzan is a conservative woman she asked her son to take her place in the picture. Suzan was born in 1969. She lives in a sector in Jordan called Rsaifeh with her husband and her five children. Her husband is a driver. One of Suzan's’ sons is studying for a Bachelor of Accounting. He is in his last year and is planning to work in his field of study after graduation in order to start supporting his family financially. He is only one step closer to reaching his goal. But Suzan doesn’t have enough money to pay for his upcoming semester fees. For this reason, she applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay for her son's upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Cesar Augusto

texts.es: Cesar Augusto nació en la ciudad de Quillabamba pero vive en la ciudad de Salvación. (La ciudad de Salvación está ubicada en el distrito del Manu en la provincia de Manu dentro del departamento de Madre de Dios, Perú), él tiene 43 años de edad, es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene dos hijos, él es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia y su actividad económica principal es la venta de carne. Ya son varios años que se dedica a la negocio y ve la muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo, él pertenece al banco comunal “Las Palmeras del Manu” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar carne. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Cesar Augusto was born in the city of Quillabamba but lives in the city of Salvación. (Salvación is located in the district of Manu, in the province of Manu part of the Department of Madre de Dios, Perú). He is 43 years old, married and has two children as fruit of this beautiful union. 

He is a hard-working and entrepreneurial person who is getting his family ahead. His main economic activity is selling meat. He has been doing this a number of years and it is going well for him, thanks to the effort he puts into his work. He belongs to the “Las Palmeras del Manu” communal bank. 

Cesar Augusto is requesting this loan to buy meat. He values and is grateful for this loan and he promises to pay his installments on time.

loans.use: to buy meat.

location.town: Salvacion - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: Estrella Del Rosario

texts.es:
Estrella, es una madre que disfruta ver crecer a su pequeña hija, ella lucha por sacarla adelante y darle lo mejor que puede, sabe que la responsabilidad es solo de ella, pues es madre soltera, vive junto a su madre y su hija, se dedica a vender tortillas, trabaja todos los días, es una actividad que realiza desde hace 2 años, debido a la necesidad de generar ingresos para ayudar a su mamá con los gastos de la casa.
Con la inversión comprará una plancha, con lo que espera aumentar su producción, vender más tortillas, atraer a más clientes, cancelar la deuda y seguir aportando con los gastos de su casa.
Desea en un futuro tener a parte de la venta de tortillas poder instalar un comedor, que mejoraría en gran medida  su economía.
texts.en:
Estrella is a mother who enjoys watching her child grow. She fights to get ahead and gives her all she can. She is the only person responsible for her daughter as she is a single mother. She lives with her mother and her daughter. She sells tortillas. She works daily and has done this for the last two years as she had to have a way to help her mother with the household expenses.

Estrella will buy a grill with the loan. She hopes to increase her production, attract more clients, pay off her debts and continue to help with the household expenses.

She hopes to open an eatery, besides selling tortillas in the future. This would improve her financial situation a lot.

loans.use: to buy a grill.

loans.name: Miria

texts.en:
Miria is a 36-year-old married woman with four children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda.  She sells cocoa and food such as maize and tomatoes and has been in this business for four years.  She is challenged by the seasonal changes which affects her output. Her future plans are to educate her children to attain degrees as a minimum qualification and to build a permanent house for her family since she is the sole income earner.

Miria is requesting a the loan to buy cocoa and food to sell.

loans.use: to buy cocoa and food to sell.

loans.name: Pheap

texts.en:
Pheap is 42-years-old and blessed with four children.  She lives in Battambang province. She tackles her family’s hardships by rice farming whereas her husband earns additional income from his job at a construction site. This is not the first loan for Pheap with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). 

She has repaid  her past loans completely and they have enabled her to maintain a stable standard of living better than before. Now, she is seeking a new loan in order to cover school fees and to buy study materials for her son who wants to earn a bachelor degree majoring in Information Technology.  She hopes that this financial support will enable her son to pay more attention to his studies in order to get a good academic performance so that he can get a good job after graduation.

loans.use: to cover school fees and to buy study materials for her son.

loans.name: Marciana

texts.en:
Marciana is 47-years-old and married with two children. Marciana works very hard to provide for them.

Marciana runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 6,000 loan through Kiva partner NWTF in order to buy additional stock to sell at her general store.

Marciana has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as candies, bread, snack foods, soft-drinks, noodles, sanitary napkins, etc. 

In the future, Marciana would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stock to sell at her general store.

loans.name: Carmen Zenovia

texts.es: Carmen agradece a todos los inversionistas que le ayudaron con el crédito y se siente muy contenta de ser parte de este proyecto, ella continua viviendo en la ciudad de Salvación y continúa dedicándose a la venta de frutas. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y ve la muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Las Palmeras del Manu” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar frutas como piñas y plátanos. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Carmen is grateful to all the investors who helped with her loan and is very happy to be a part of this project. She still lives in the city of Salvación and still earns a living by selling fruit. She has been doing this for several years now,and the business is going well thanks to her determination. 

Carmen belongs to the "Las Palmeras del Manu" communal bank and, on this occasion, is requesting a loan in order to buy fruit such as pineapples and bananas. She is grateful for and knows the value of this loan, and is committed to making her monthly repayments.

loans.use: to buy fruit such as pineapples and bananas.

location.town: Salvacion - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan, cultiva maíz, está acompañado, tiene 30 años, tiene dos hijos de 3 y 5 años, vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos. Aprendió el oficio de su padre, desde hace 6 años lo hace de forma independiente, trabaja de lunes a sábado de 6:00 a.m. hasta las 12:00 p.m. Por su conocimiento en esta actividad no ha tenido dificultades en ejercerla.
Invertirá en la compra abono, plaguicidas, insecticidas, semilla, teniendo los insumos necesarios podrá preparar la tierra y sembrar sin ningún problema, espera tener una buena producción, mejores ingresos, cancelar las deudas y diversificar su cultivo.
Desea tener los recursos necesarios para darle a su familia una mejor alimentación salud y que sus hijos tengan la oportunidad de tener una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Juan is 30 years old, and has a common-law wife, and two children who are 3 and 5 years old. He lives with his wife and children. Juan grows corn, and learned this trade from his father. For the last 6 years, he has been working independently. He works from Monday through Saturday from 6 am until 12 pm. Due to his knowledge in this field, he hasn't had any difficulty with this work. 

He will use the loan to buy fertilizer, pesticides, insecticides and seeds, and thus have the supplies needed for preparing the earth for planting. He hopes to have a good harvest, higher earnings, and to pay off debts and diversify his crop. 

Juan hopes to have the resources to give his family better, healthier food, and to give his children the opportunity to go to university.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticides, insecticides, seeds.

loans.name: Hélène Nathalie

texts.fr: Hélène est  une jeune femme de 29 ans fiancée. Après sa formation, elle a ouvert un petit atelier de couture qui fonctionne bien depuis 5 ans déjà, elle fait aussi le surfilage mais n'a pas tout le matériel pour aller plus vite avec ses commandes et pouvoir satisfaire sa clientèle à temps. C'est pour celà qu'elle sollicite un crédit pour s'acheter la surfileuse, des tissus et le petit matériel de coutures (épingles, aiguilles, doublure, fil...) qui l'évitera d'aller au marché tout le temps, elle pourra coudre et revendre à ses clients. Le bénéfice tiré de ce crédit lui permettra non seulement de s'acheter son petit matériel de couture pour agrandir son activité, mais aussi de satisfaire certains de ses besoins ainsi que ceux de sa famille.
texts.en: Hélène is a young woman, 29 years old and engaged. After her training, she opened a small sewing workshop that has been doing well for the past 5 years She also does the overcasting but does not have the equipment to process orders faster and satisfy her customers in time. That is why she is requesting a loan to buy the overcasting machine, fabric, and little sewing materials (pins, needles, lining, thread ...), avoiding going to the market all the time, so that she could sew and sell to her customers. The income from this loan will allow her not only to buy her little sewing materials to grow her business, but also to meet some of her needs and those of her family.

loans.use: to buy a surfileuse [a machine for overcasting] and a small sewing kit

loans.name: Mom's Group

texts.en: Mom is 30 years old and a villager from Battambang province’s Thmor Koul district. For her family, the primary sources of income are from rice farming and a part-time part time job as a paid worker. This is the second microloan for Mom with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). The past loan, which she has repaid completely, has enabled her to do her rice farming on schedule and keep her kids in school. For this cycle, she has formed a group of three to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer for her crops. She hopes that she will receive triple yield in return.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her crops

loans.name: Noora

texts.en: Noora was born in 1962. She is a widowed woman who lives in a sector in Jordan called Dairalla with her four children. Noora has been trying her best to support her children financially after her husband's death. She has been selling home products for one year. She started her project with a small quantity of them. She considered her work as a good source of income to support her children and cover their needs. Now she is planning to expand her project by buying a larger quantity of home products to raise her profits. However, she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she applied for this loan.

loans.use: to buy more home products for her business

loans.name: Marciano

texts.en: Marciano is married and a father of five school-aged dependents. Marciano is a farmer that plants and harvests rice for a living.  He has been engaged in this activity for more than nine years, making a good living for the family. Marciano used his previous loans to finance his farm, and was able to repay successfully. Aside from this, he has cultivated an additional plot of rice for expansion. Now, he requests a new loan to purchase fertilizer in order to have a greener farm. Marciano is determined to gain more profit from his effort and investments. Hopefully, in the near future, his family will make a better living.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer

loans.name: María De Jesús

texts.es:
María es una persona de 35 años de edad posee una familia bien establecida junto a su esposo, el cual posee ya una edad avanzada, tienen 3 hijas 16 , 12, y 5 años , las cuales estudian y su propósito es finalizar sus estudios , la cliente se puede mencionar que es un pilar fundamental en el hogar , siendo ella quien vela por su familia .


Además de realizar sus oficios domésticos, la señora también es un apoyo para su esposo en los trabajos agrícolas, ya que por sus escasos recursos y los problemas de salud de su esposo se dificulta cancelar mano de obra, por lo cual de vez en cuando su presencia es indispensable.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar especies menores (cerdos), pretende comprar entre 4 y 5 cerdos para crecerlos y buscar un ingreso que les permita solventar el compromiso a la fecha de vencimiento del crédito, la idea surge tomando en cuenta que habrá cosecha abundante y facilita la crianza.

María manifiesta que su prioridad siempre será su familia y que todo lo que realiza es proyectando un futuro para ellos,  pretende mantener siempre esta mano amiga para continuar su lucha.
texts.en:
María is thirty-five years old. She and her husband, who is now older, have a well-established family. They have three daughters, aged five, twelve, and sixteen years old, who are students and have the goal of completing their studies. María says that she is a cornerstone of the household since she is the one who watches over the family. 

Besides taking care of the housework, she also helps her husband with farm work: due to limited resources and her husband's health problems, it is difficult to pay for labor. For this reason, her presence is vital.

The loan that she is applying for is to buy small farm animals (pigs). She hopes to buy four or five pigs to fatten for an income that will allow her to repay her loan obligation at the maturity date. This idea is emerging by taking into account that there will be an abundant harvest which will make raising the pigs easier.

María says that her family is always her priority and that everything she does is to build a future for them. She hopes to always carry on with this helping hand to continue her fight.

loans.use: to buy four or five pigs to fatten.

loans.name: Maria Flor

texts.en:
Maria Flor is 43 years old and has four children. Maria Flor is married and has one child who is still in school.

Maria Flor is in the agricultural business and raises pigs in the Philippines. Maria Flor requested a PHP 19000 loan through NWTF to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Maria Flor has been raising pigs for 13 years now, and has borrowed 10 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her work.

Maria Flor would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn works hard to support her family. Marilyn is married and has a dried fish vending business in the Philippines.

Marilyn has requested a PHP 8000 loan through NWTF to buy additional fish for her business.

Marilyn has been in this business for 4 years now.

Marilyn would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional fish for her business

loans.name: Karen Waldina

texts.es:
La joven Karen  es una persona muy trabajadora, responsable y  humilde,  vive junto a sus hermanos y su madre en una comunidad en la zona  sur de Honduras. Su negocio es una glorieta donde vende comidas y también  da el servicio  de internet  el cual es muy conocido en su colonia. 
Karen  necesita el préstamo para la compra de mercadería  como  carnes,  refrescos,  agua, plátanos, papas, churros y un tóner este último para su negocio de internet. Espera que gracias al préstamo poder contar con los productos  necesarios para seguir realizando sus actividades y así cubrir la demanda de sus clientes.
 Karen le gustaría que sus ventas  aumentaran  y que  se vea reflejado en su  calidad de vida  y de su familia, uno de sus sueños es que su negocio  siga creciendo y convirtiéndose en el más conocido de la comunidad  y  de esta manera poder seguir apoyando a su familia.


Choluteca, Honduras – Octubre   del  2013
texts.en:
Karen is a very hard-working, responsible, and humble young woman. She lives with her siblings and her mother in a community in the southern part of Honduras. Her business is a food stall, where she sells meals and also provides Internet service, which is very well-known in her colony.

Karen needs the loan for purchasing merchandise, such as meat, soft drink, water, plantains, potatoes, and churros, as well as toner for her Internet provider business. She hopes that thanks to the loan she will be able to have the necessary products to continue doing her work and meet customer demand.

Karen would like her sales to increase and her family’s quality of life and her own quality of life to improve as well. One of her dreams is that her business will continue growing and become the most well-known in the community so she can continue supporting her family.



Choluteca, Honduras – October 2013

loans.use: to purchase meat, soft drink, water, plantains, potatoes, churros, and toner for her business

loans.name: Martha Concepción

texts.es:
Martha de 43 años de edad, sus estudios los realizo hasta 5° grado, el motivo por el cual, no pudo seguir estudiando; es por que en ese tiempo no existía el nivel de noveno grado. Ella creció con su familia y luego trabajo con su madre, ya que la mamá vendía carne en el mercado, ella le ayudaba a vender. Luego se caso y se salio de la casa de su padre, con su nueva familia comenzaron con el esposo a trabajar en el destazo de animales y a la venta de animales vivos también,luego nacieron los hijos y crecieron y hoy están acompañados solo uno esta con ellos.   

El negocio que pose es la venta de carne y queso, este conocimiento lo adquirió desde los 15 años. Martha vende junto a su madre, en el mercado la distancia que le queda desde su casa al centro  son 3km y a la vez trabajan toda su familia. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar queso para trasladarlo hasta la capital, una hermana le compra el queso. Esto le mejorara su negocio, en la entrada de dinero para tener mejor condición de vida.


La señora menciona que lo que quiere realizar a futuro, es terminar la casa por completo ponerle las puertas, el piso y para sus hijo ayudarle en lo que pueda.
texts.en:
43-year-old Martha went to school until the fifth grade. The reason she could not continue studying is because in that time the ninth grade did not exist. She grew up with her family and she later worked with her mother. Since her mother sold meat in the market, she helped her mother to sell the meat. She later married, left her father’s house, and began working with her husband butchering animals and selling live animals. She later gave birth to her children and raised them and now only one of them is living with her.

Her business sells meat and cheese, and she learnt how to do it fifteen years ago. Martha sells these products with her mother in the market, which is 3km away, and her whole family works as well.

The loan she is requesting is for purchasing cheese and transporting it to the capital. A sister will buy the cheese. This will improve her business and her living conditions. 

She says that in the future she would like to completely finish her house and put in the doors and the floor, and to have her children help her as much as they can.

loans.use: to purchase cheese and transport it to the capital

loans.name: Bon

texts.en:
